response.original_title: All The Bodies He Left Behind
response.overview: A teenage assassin moves through a collapsing world, killing strangers without explanation. Each victim represents a piece of knowledge â€” language, faith, art, expression. As he approaches his final target, he begins to confront the meaning behind the violence. All the Bodies He Left Behind is a psychological drama that explores the quiet erasure of identity, memory, and the human need for meaning.
response.title: All The Bodies He Left Behind
